idea:
We are in the process of starting a WHO-GMP compliiant pharmaceutical unit for capsule / tablet manufacturing unit near Nashik Maharashtra. Considering the norms and regulations required for pharmaceutical industries ,we need to have capital investment to the extent of Rs.5 to 6 Cr.( Minimum excluding land cost). We have approached the few banks and everyone is saying that no loan will be sanctioned without collateral security. 

We are forming a private limited company is procedure for name approval and obtaining DIN for would be directors is in process. We can enclose the proof of ROC documents in next 7-10 days. But unless we come out with funding arrangement all this excercise will be of no use.

We are group of people which includes one doctatorate person in Pharmacy and others are in manufacturing industry.  All of us have experiance of about 23  years each.


We look forward for your supportto enable us to start state of art facility.
name: Makarand Hardikar

idea: Aquaculture is inland breeding and growing of Fishes and Shrimps in a controlled environment. India is also an important country that produces fish through aquaculture in the world. India is home to more than 10 percent of the global fish diversity. Presently, the country ranks second in the world in total fish production with an annual fish production of about 9.06 million metric tonnes. The production of fishes and shrimps in India is growing rapidly at the rate of 15% annually. We cater to this industry by providing them Water Oxygenation machines, Automatic feeders, Air injectors, Sprinkler aerators, Root Blowers, DO kits on a Subscription model.
name: SUYOG AQUATECH PRIVATE LIMITED
